name: Heavyweight Juan
description: Juan is a food thief, famous for robbing supermarkets in broad daylight. In this game, the player will have to assume the role of Juan and try to eat as much food as possible in the supermarket aisles, while trying to avoid the security guards. All foods give different scores, but they also give or take kilograms, making Juan lighter or heavier, faster or slower. The player will have to eat most of the food in order to the supermarket door open and the Juan is able to escape.
